myTickets.createPageDescription: Encountering issues? Submit a ticket and our support team will help you quickly.

create.formDescription: Describe the issue in detail so we can resolve it faster.
create.fileSizeLimit: Supports images, PDFs, documents. Max 5 files, 512MB each.
create.detailsDescription: Describe the issue in detail so we can resolve it faster.
create.descriptionPlaceholder:
Describe the problem in detail, including:
1. When and how often it occurs
2. Error messages or behavior
3. Troubleshooting steps you have tried
4. Impact on your business
create.uploadInfo: Supports images, PDFs, documents. Max 5 files, 512MB each.

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: - Provide as much detail as possible so we can quickly identify the issue.
tips.tip2: - Screenshots or error logs greatly help our troubleshooting.
tips.tip3: - Specify when the issue occurs (always, intermittently, after specific actions).
tips.tip4: - You can track ticket status and reply to the support team under "My Tickets."

detail.replyDescription: Your reply will be sent to the support team
detail.closedMessage: This ticket is closed. Please create a new ticket to continue discussion.

feedback.pageDescription: Your suggestions are important and help us continuously improve.
feedback.formDescription: Please describe your suggestion so we can evaluate and consider implementing it.
feedback.descriptionPlaceholder:
Please describe your suggestion in detail, including:
1. What you would like to change
2. Why this improvement is needed
3. Expected outcomes or benefits
feedback.contactHelp: If we need more details about your suggestion, we may contact you this way.

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: - Be as detailed as possible so we can clearly understand your needs.
tips.tip2: - If your suggestion involves a specific feature or UI, screenshots or examples help.
tips.tip3: - We review all suggestions regularly and prioritize the most valuable improvements.
tips.tip4: - You can track suggestion status under "My Tickets."

complaints.title: Submit complaint
complaints.subtitle: We value every customer's feedback; your complaint will be handled promptly.
complaints.detailsDescription: Please describe your complaint in detail. We will investigate and respond quickly.

descriptionField.label: Detailed description *
descriptionField.placeholder:
Please describe the complaint in detail, including:
1. When and where the issue happened
2. People or products involved
3. The specific issue and its impact
4. Your expected resolution

contactField.label: Contact method *
contactField.help: We will contact you via this method to follow up on your complaint.

complaints.success: Your complaint has been submitted. We will process it as soon as possible.
warnings: Please provide accurate information so we can handle your complaint effectively.
We will provide an initial response within 24 hours of receiving your complaint.
Urgent complaints are prioritized for rapid resolution.
You can check complaint updates and replies under "My Tickets."
If you have any questions, contact us via live chat at any time.
complaints.loginRequired: Please login to submit a complaint

hero.title: Transform Your Customer Service
hero.subtitle: AI-powered platform for seamless customer support and engagement

hero.description: Track, manage, and optimize your fleet operations with our comprehensive platform. Real-time insights for better decision making.

features.title: Everything you need to manage your fleet
features.description: Powerful features designed to help you reduce costs, improve safety, and increase operational efficiency.

realTimeTracking.name: Real-time Tracking
realTimeTracking.description: Monitor your fleet locations and status in real-time with advanced GPS integration.

performanceAnalytics.name: Performance Analytics
performanceAnalytics.description: Get detailed insights into fuel usage, driver behavior, and maintenance needs.

safetyCompliance.name: Safety & Compliance
safetyCompliance.description: Ensure your fleet meets all regulatory requirements and safety standards automatically.

maintenanceScheduling.name: Maintenance Scheduling
maintenanceScheduling.description: Automated alerts and scheduling for vehicle maintenance to prevent downtime.

cta.title: Ready to optimize your fleet operations?
cta.description: Join over 2,000 companies using FleetCommand to reduce costs and improve safety.
cta.noCreditCard: No credit card required. 14-day free trial.
